snippet: The world champion Marit Bjoergen has won a record-tying fifth overall World Cup cross-country sprint title, and Finn Haagen Krogh captured his first.
abstract: Marit Bjoergen wins overall World Cup cross-country sprint title; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The world champion Marit Bjoergen has won a record-tying fifth overall World Cup cross-country sprint title, and Finn Haagen Krogh captured his first.

headline.main: Bjoergen and Krogh Earn Sprint Titles
